column17:
The pack of socks from Adidas features elasticated and ribbed cuffs and has Adidas branding below the cuffs on one side and NBA on the other. The socks have reinforced heel and toe and are also well cushioned that will secure your feet during rigorous training and running sessions.

Features
  • Colour: White Black
  • Material: Cotton Nylon and Spandex
  • Length: Ankle high
  • Pattern: Solid

Care Tips
Do not bleach or dry clean
Wash with like colours
Line dry
Warm iron
